[![](https://i0.wp.com/static.flickr.com/20/73771019_0d8b20cb2d.jpg?w=960)](http://www.flickr.com/photos/adders/73771019/ "photo sharing") [Stock Shortage](http://www.flickr.com/photos/adders/73771019/), originally uploaded by [Adam Tinworth](http://www.flickr.com/people/adders/).
While we’re on the subject of dubious meat products, it seems that a certain burger chain was hit hard by the [fire in Hemel Hempstead last week](http://www.bbc.co.uk/threecounties/read_this/buncefield_explosions/). Isn’t it the other lot who claim that their products are flame grilled? Technorati Tags: [buncefield](http://www.technorati.com/tag/buncefield), [mcdonalds](http://www.technorati.com/tag/mcdonalds)
